mapper.select: SELECT CLASS_NO, CLASS_NM, CLASS_PRICE, TEACHER_NO FROM CLASS
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO EVENT ( EVENT_TITLE, EVENT_CONTENT, EVENT_COST, EVENT_START_DT, EVENT_END_DT, CLASS_NO, ADMIN_ID ) VALUES ( #{eventTitle}, #{eventContent}, #{eventCost}, #{eventStartDt}, #{eventEndDt}, #{classNo}, #{adminId} )
mapper.select: SELECT E.EVENT_NO EVENT_NO, E.EVENT_TITLE EVENT_TITLE, E.EVENT_COST EVENT_COST, E.EVENT_CONTENT EVENT_CONTENT, C.CLASS_NO CLASS_NO, C.CLASS_NM CLASS_NM, C.CLASS_CONTENT CLASS_CONTENT, C.CLASS_PRICE CLASS_PRICE, C.CLASS_TIME CLASS_TIME, C.CLASS_CATEGORY CLASS_CATEGORY, C.CLASS_LIMIT CLASS_LIMIT, C.TEACHER_NO TEACHER_NO, CI.CLASS_IMG_NO CLASS_IMG_NO, CI.CLASS_IMG_NM CLASS_IMG_NM, CI.CLASS_IMG_UUID CLASS_IMG_UUID, T.TEACHER_NM TEACHER_NM, T.TEACHER_CAREER TEACHER_CAREER FROM EVENT E LEFT JOIN CLASS C ON C.CLASS_NO = E.CLASS_NO JOIN CLASS_IMAGES CI ON C.CLASS_NO = CI.CLASS_NO LEFT JOIN TEACHER T ON C.TEACHER_NO = T.TEACHER_NO WHERE EVENT_NO = #{eventNo}
mapper.update: UPDATE EVENT SET EVENT_TITLE = #{eventTitle}, EVENT_CONTENT = #{eventContent}, EVENT_COST = #{eventCost}, EVENT_START_DT = #{eventStartDt}, EVENT_END_DT = #{eventEndDt} WHERE EVENT_NO = #{eventNo}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM REVIEWS R JOIN CLASS C ON C.CLASS_NO = R.CLASS_NO JOIN EVENT E ON C.CLASS_NO = E.EVENT_NO WHERE C.CLASS_NO = #{classNo}
SELECT COALESCE(ROUND(AVG(REVIEW_SCORE)), 0) AVG_SCORE FROM REVIEWS R LEFT JOIN CLASS C ON C.CLASS_NO = R.CLASS_NO JOIN EVENT E ON C.CLASS_NO = E.EVENT_NO WHERE C.CLASS_NO = #{classNo}
